CustomField.inlineHelpText: Handler instigates a game, runs around and watches response and ability to calm. Stop if the dog becomes too excited or reacts negatively.
CustomField.label: General Play

value.fullName: Relaxed/engaged: interested/appropriate, responds, follows, may play bow, calms quickly or copes
value.label: Relaxed/engaged: interested/appropriate, responds, follows, may play bow, calms quickly or copes

value.fullName: Avoids: retreats, may actively ignore or avoid but recovers and approaches afterwards
value.label: Avoids: retreats, may actively ignore or avoid but recovers and approaches afterwards

value.fullName: Fearful: lowered body language, tail tuck, may alarm bark, does not recover easily
value.label: Fearful: lowered body language, tail tuck, may alarm bark, does not recover easily

value.fullName: Excitable: barks, arousal increase but positive valence
value.label: Excitable: barks, arousal increase but positive valence

value.fullName: Overstimulated: high arousal, no self-regulation, may mouth, jump up, vocalise
value.label: Overstimulated: high arousal, no self-regulation, may mouth, jump up, vocalise

value.fullName: Confrontational: may bark, growl, lunge, clasp, hump, slow or no recovery
value.label: Confrontational: may bark, growl, lunge, clasp, hump, slow or no recovery
